FuncDef: This command configures the ANL roundtrip delay threshold to be used for congestion detection algorithm (if applicable).

ParaDef.Info: This parameter is used by the DEM-GW algorithm that determines ANL congestion. It specifics the maximum acceptable round trip time (RTT), in milliseconds, for TCP connections under no congestion. Any measured RTT above the threshold is considered an indication of possible congestion. Values-0 to 500.
